meanings.definition: Situated or occurring beneath the eye.
meanings.sent1: The suboptic area of the face is below the eye.
meanings.sent2: She had a suboptic freckle just under her eye.
meanings.sent3: The suboptic sunglasses made her look like a secret agent.
meanings.sent4: His suboptic tattoo symbolized his hidden emotions.
meanings.sent5: The suboptic shadow cast by the eyelashes created a mysterious look.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the area below the eye.
meanings.sent1: The suboptic region includes the cheek and lower eyelid.
meanings.sent2: Her makeup focused on enhancing her suboptic features.
meanings.sent3: The suboptic makeup trend became popular among teenagers.
meanings.sent4: The suboptic skincare routine targeted dark circles.
meanings.sent5: The suboptic swelling indicated lack of sleep.

meanings.definition: A device or technology that is positioned below the eye.
meanings.sent1: The suboptic scanner read the data from below the eye.
meanings.sent2: He developed a suboptic camera for underwater exploration.
meanings.sent3: The suboptic gadget helped in tracking eye movements.
meanings.sent4: The suboptic display projected images directly under the eye.
meanings.sent5: The suboptic sensor detected even the slightest movements.
